main event: Several policemen and a primary school teacher reported seeing flying saucers and a luminous object in the sky over Guatemala.
interesting points: The sighting involved multiple witnesses, including an ambulant police squad and a teacher,The police reported seeing four flying saucers traveling northward in low formation and at high speed,The luminous object was described as being in the form of a cigarette with pale red light flashes,The sightings occurred around the same time on July 22, 1956,The incident was documented and categorized under Project 10073 and Project Blue Book.
sighted object: four flying saucers and a luminous object in the shape of a cigarette
witness description: several policemen and a primary school teacher
